text:
Madelaine Grobbelaar Petsch (born August 18, 1994) is an American actress. She is known for playing Cheryl Blossom in The CW series "Riverdale". Her movie credits include "F the Prom" (2017) and "Polaroid" (2019). She also has a YouTube channel, with over five million subscribers.
Petsch was born in Port Orchard, Washington. Her parents are from South Africa. She is a vegan.
